content: when the first spring rays of sun light appear from the earth peep out the little heads of crocuses narcissus and tulips the magic play of colours starts again it is the right time to make for this spring the stuffed shawl it is the light airy and triangle shape with easy memorable pattern it will not take much of our time it is convenient for beginners and young knitters use three different wools with speckled color *create your own spring combination * **added a smaller size ** separately in pdf **size** one size **large** approx 300 cm / 118 wide and 58 cm / 23 long at center one size **medium** approx 220 cm / 86 wide and 40 cm / 16 long at center measurements taken after blocking **gauge** 18 sts & 36 row = 10 cm / 4 in garter stitch blocked exact gauge is not important but may affect yardage sorry in large size pdf a gauge is written incorrectly **yarn** fingering 4ply **shown in** 100% sw merino wool single 400 m / 437 yds per 100 g skein **yardage large** color a 35 g 140 m / 153 yds color b 70 g 280 m / 306 yds color c 100 g 400 m / 437 yds **yardage medium** color a 25 g 100 m / 110 yds color b 50 g 200 m / 219 yds color c 75 g 300 m / 328 yds
